bibl.title: Beyond Old Dongola: The Multicomponent Site of Hag Magid (Letti Basin).
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Study of the site of Hag Magid where material from the Neolithic, Christian and post-Christian periods was recorded. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Krzysztof Grzymski, Beyond Old Dongola: The Multicomponent Site of Hag Magid (Letti Basin).
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 381-387, 5 figg.
Study of the site of Hag Magid where material from the Neolithic, Christian and post-Christian periods was recorded. - Avec résumé en anglais.
